s_potion.name: Small healing potion
s_potion.description: A potion that restores 10 points of health. Who needs hospitals when you have one of these bad boys?

m_potion.name: Medium healing potion
m_potion.description: A potion that restores 20 points of health. Who needs hospitals when you have one of these bad boys?

l_potion.name: Large healing potion
l_potion.description: A potion that restores 30 points of health. Who needs hospitals when you have one of these bad boys?

w_sword.name: Wooden sword
w_sword.description: You have to start with something

g_tooth.name: Goblin tooth
g_tooth.description: A tooth from a goblin. It's not worth much, but it's better than nothing.

orc_ear.name: Orc ear
orc_ear.description: An ear from an orc. It's not worth much, but it's better than nothing.

troll_hide.name: Troll hide
troll_hide.description: A hide from a troll. It's not worth much, but it's better than nothing.
